core:process.core:comment: Voids a gift card item or gift card tender item, reversing the authorisation if necessary. Checks user authorisation and captures reason code (unless part of a transaction void).

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: TODO - this needs to be moved

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Suppress messages when used in transaction void
Suppress messages when used in transaction void

core:eventLink.core:comment: Skip authorisation check and reason prompt if voiding as a child item or as part of a transaction void.
